content.p: Interprofessional Education is learning together to promote collaborative practice when two or more professions learn from and about each other to improve collaboration and the quality of health and social care (Barr 2002). Evening masterclasses, student-led activities, near-peer facilitator training, and NAA modules Develop a new interprofessional activity with us, facilitate a CIEL workshop, present at a masterclass Meet the CIEL team, our management board, and our student committee Ask a question or share an idea Room E41, E Floor, Medical School University of Nottingham, Queen's Medical Centre, Nottingham, NG7 2UH Tel: +44 (0)115 8 230 818 Email: ciel@nottingham.ac.uk
